oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sheet music for "God Save the Southern Land"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sheet music for song titled "God Save the Southern Land." Published in Richmond, Virginia "to be sold for the benefit of Soldiers and Needy Families." Words and music "adapted from an English ballad by Chaplain Cameron CSA." Authorized in 1864 by the Confederate Congress, the song is "Respectfully dedicated to the soldier's friend Mrs. J. Peterkin."
